about.name: Ryan Chen (Website In Progress)
about.title: Current Student at Boston College
about.description: Ryan Chen is a full-time student at Boston College, pursuing a B.A. in Economics and B.S. in Computer Science. He was born and raised in Avon, Connecticut before moving to Shanghai at the age of 10 to study at Concordia International School Shanghai. He studied in Shanghai for 8 years before graduating and coming back to the U.S. to study at BC.

projects.title: Bullseye
projects.source: iOS Apprentice, 6th ed. by Matthijs Hollemans and Fahim Fahrook. Copyright Â©2017 Razeware LLC
projects.description: The first app I made, introducing me to both Swift and xCode with guided instruction from iOS Apprentice.

projects.title: Space Invaders
projects.authors: Ryan Chen, Kevin Jin, Henry Cheng
projects.description: Game created as a project in AP Computer Science, emulating the original Space Invaders game (1978) by Taito. Source code was provided by Kevin Glass, creating the base game and its visuals, but as a group we worked on the movement of the character and the mechanics/rules of the game itself.

projects.title: MasterPlan
projects.authors: Ryan Chen, Yoochan Shin, Joshua Shou, Evelyn Shi, Allison Chen
projects.source: Intended for use by Concordia National Honor Society
projects.description: This app was designed to streamline both tutoring and service opportunities. Students would be able to register as either a tutor or tutee in any field including Math, Science, English, Social Sciences, and Chinese, as well as observe upcoming service opportunities and register for them through the app.
